backend/main.mo: Defines data models for rooms, styles, products, orders, users, and helper array utilities for the backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records linking features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files for documentation or build reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining theme tokens, dark mode variables, and global color system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the root React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for all major pages and wraps the app with layout, theming, and React Query providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter basic profile info and saving it via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/cart/AddToCartBu: Button component that adds a product to the cart, showing toast feedback and disabling when out of stock.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Consul: A form component that lets authenticated users request a consultation by submitting a date, notes, and generating a request ID, using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Provides the main site layout with header, footer, and profile setup dialog surrounding page content.
frontend/src/components/navigation/SiteF: Renders the site footer with branding, links, social icons, and a dynamic locations list.
frontend/src/components/navigation/SiteH: Implements the site header with navigation links, category menu, authentication controls, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/packages/Package: Displays informational sections about the design process and what is included in service packages using styled cards.
frontend/src/components/packages/room-pa: Shows a single included product with image, description, price, and stock status.
Displays a sortable grid of included products using IncludedProductCard components.
Provides skeleton placeholders for the included products panel while data is loading.
Displays a detailed header for a room package including name, description, labels, price, and an add-to-cart button.
Renders a grid of room packages and delegates item rendering to RoomPackageListItem with selection handling.
Clickable card showing a room package’s name, labels, price, and brief description with selection highlighting.
Skeleton loader showing placeholder cards while room package data is loading.
frontend/src/components/packages/StylePa: Allows users to filter room packages by style and room type, view package details, and add all related products to the cart.
frontend/src/components/products/SafeExt: Image wrapper that swaps to a fallback source if the external image fails to load.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the caller’s user profile using the backend actor and handles actor loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing identity loading, login, and logout states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of hooks for fetching and mutating backend resources like packages, designers, briefs, consultations, notes, and profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: Hooks for retrieving the caller’s user role and admin status from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind theme variables for light and dark modes with warm color palettes and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/cart/CartPage.tsx: Shows cart items with quantity controls, subtotal calculation, and navigation to checkout or shopping pages.
frontend/src/pages/checkout/CheckoutPage: Handles order checkout with delivery address validation, payment method selection, and order placement.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardPa: Displays a user dashboard with project briefs, status badges, and links to create or view design projects.
frontend/src/pages/DesignerDetailPage.ts: Shows a detailed profile for a selected designer, including bio, styles, and portfolio with loading and not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/DesignersPage.tsx: Lists designers with search and style filtering, displaying profiles in a card grid.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Renders an FAQ list using an accordion with predefined questions and answers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with hero content, feature highlights, and authentication‑aware onboarding navigation.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Explains the step‑by‑step design process with descriptive sections and feature lists.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Shows a 404 message with a link to return to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/Onboarding: Multi-step onboarding quiz that collects room type, style preferences, budget, and timeline, updating onboarding store state and navigating to review.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/ProjectBri: Displays a summary of collected onboarding data and submits a project brief to the backend after authentication.
frontend/src/pages/PackagesPage.tsx: Displays available design packages, highlights the most popular option, and lets users select a package to start onboarding.
frontend/src/pages/products/ProductBrand: Loads and displays products for a specific brand with handling for loading, errors, missing brands, and empty product lists.
Fetches and lists all product brands with loading, error, and empty-state handling, allowing navigation to brand detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/products/ProductCateg: Fetches and displays product categories sorted by hierarchy depth, with loading, error, and empty-state handling and category image selection logic.
Displays products for a given category, handling loading, errors, empty states, and product listing with add‑to‑cart support.
frontend/src/pages/products/RoomCategory: Shows an introductory page for browsing room‑based style packages using the StylePackagesSection component.
frontend/src/pages/products/ShopLandingP: Landing page offering navigation tiles to shop by room packages, product categories, or brands.
frontend/src/pages/projects/ProjectWorks: Workspace page for a project showing brief details, notes, and an interface to add new notes.
frontend/src/pages/RoomVisualizerPage.ts: Provides a manual room visualization tool where users upload a room photo, select a product, and adjust its scale and position.
frontend/src/routes/RequireAuth.tsx: Auth guard that blocks access until the user is signed in, showing a sign‑in prompt if not authenticated.
frontend/src/state/cartStore.ts: Zustand store managing cart items with add, bulk add, remove, quantity updates, and subtotal and count helpers.
frontend/src/state/onboardingStore.ts: Zustand store for onboarding selections including room type, styles, budget, timeline, and chosen package.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Provides INR currency formatting and timestamp formatting utilities for dates and date‑times.
frontend/src/utils/locations.ts: Generates a location list with Ahmedabad always appearing first while preserving order of others.
frontend/src/utils/roomPackageSort.ts: Defines sort options and a function to sort products by name or price in ascending or descending order.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project state, existing features, pending requests, and overall project configuration.
